TopicTitle: I can't delete a post?! Seriously?

Articles.Content:
Filling in required text because I cannot delete my own, unresponded-to post.

Edited August 21, 2018 by slaintemaith

I don't know how to delete anything but imgur images still work. Though albums don't.

Here's some random ship I made 4 years ago.
 

Spoiler

Moved from Add-on Releases, since the title was no longer relevant in that forum.

Unfortunately, deleting is not allowed because it allowed miscreants to abuse other users and then remove the evidence.

Use the Report post in the top left of a post, if you want it removed, moved or a moderators to take a look at it for some reason. If your request is reasonable and not against the forum guidelines, then there's a good chance we'll do it.
